page.title: 13District Councillor's Day
page.content: 7.00,a fine morning.Inspect live- stock in fields;1 ewe dead from unknown cause.Return to farmhouse for help to lift ewe onto Land Rover.Phone Hunt kennels for disposal.Breakfast.Return to fields with girl assistant to muster calves for medication for intestinal worms.Also inject some for contagious ophthalmia.9.45,return calves to new pasture.Muster 500 ewes and lambs for same treatment.12.30 discover some ewes have escaped;recover them and put into field.1.15 lunch and see assistant off on holiday.3.15,rest and clean up. 4.30,depart for North Marston to help constituent with planning problem. 5.45,attend Council meeting.6.15, discuss problem with Development Officer.6.30,Development and Recreation meeting,uncontroversial and soporific. 8.30,leave for home.9.00 final live- stock chores around farmyard.9.30,bed.
